body_html:
I confirmed that using stop_gradient as described above makes wrong output.

I'm sure the implementation of FusedBatchNormGradGrad is inefficient,
but I don't have any good idea to solve this problem yet.

body:
I confirmed that using stop_gradient as described above makes wrong output.

I'm sure the implementation of FusedBatchNormGradGrad is inefficient,
